apps.title: BULLY
apps.description: A revolutionary music production app designed by Kanye West. Features include beat making, sample manipulation, and AI-assisted composition.

apps.title: Photoshop
apps.description: The industry-standard image editing software used by professionals worldwide for photo editing, graphic design, and digital art creation.

apps.title: Final Cut Pro
apps.description: Professional video editing software with powerful tools for creating, editing and producing high-quality videos and films.

apps.title: Figma
apps.description: Collaborative interface design tool that enables multiple designers to work together in real-time on UI/UX projects.

apps.title: VSCode
apps.description: Lightweight but powerful source code editor with built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js and a rich ecosystem of extensions.

apps.title: Notion
apps.description: All-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases. Customize your workflow and collaborate with your team seamlessly.

apps.title: Slack
apps.description: Business communication platform offering many IRC-style features, including persistent chat rooms, private groups, and direct messaging.

apps.title: Spotify
apps.description: Digital music streaming service that gives you access to millions of songs, podcasts and videos from artists all over the world.
